title: [Gameplay] Textures are a bit darker than normal
body: So in the game is just played in the PBE just a few minutes ago on my PBE account Irokus.  I noticed that champion textures and the minions were a shade darker than normal. I was playing Azir and noticed right away that his coloring was rusty yellow instead of the shining golden he usually is. I don't know if this was intended, my settings, or a bug that just showed up but I thought to report it anyways. I've also included a screenshot of the way it looks on my screen.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

First off, thanks for the report! We're working on fixing the issue! 

In the future, please report PBE bugs on the [PBE boards](http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/). :]
Alrighty. Sorry I'm still new. Just joined the PBE a few days ago ^ ^;

No worries at all! 

I suggest checking out [this thread](http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/G2h6QTbN-useful-information-for-new-pbe-players) - it's a great resource for new PBE players! :D
